description: To export a VWI file from Microsoft Visio, open the workflow, select the Process tab in the SharePoint Workflow group, click Export , then choose the Visio Workflow Interchange format. After exporting the VWI file, you can import it into SharePoint Designer.
To import a VWI file into Microsoft Visio that was created by SharePoint Designer follow these instructions:
NOTE: Microsoft Visio is a program used for making drawings and technical illustrations.
